page.title: 10 I.Y.Y. SHUGBOROUGH. 1985
page.content: I went to Shugborough Hall for the International Youth Year (IYY) festival being held there.There were groups of scouts,army cadets,youth clubs and Boys Brigade all putting on seperate displays. This was a two day event.On the first day Princess Anne visited the show and the second day was open to the public. The army cadets had an air rifle range,a false minefield and some canoes on display.Out of these I went on the air rifles and in a canoe.The youth clubs had dancers and a tuck shop. The Boys Brigade had basket making, canoe mending,map reading and two computers(I was sanding a canoe). The scouts had set up a scaffolding and were abseiling.They were also painting pottery. Lord Lichfield was there,walking around and visiting the marquees.
